parameters.name: PointX
parameters.description: x coordinate in pixels relative to upper-left corner of screen

parameters.name: PointY
parameters.description: y coordinate in pixels relative to upper-left corner of screen

parameters.name: ArrowPos
parameters.description: Arrow position as defined in swArrowPosition

parameters.name: UrlLoc
parameters.description: Any valid Windows Internet Explorer file (see Remarks )

title: ISldWorks.ShowBubbleTooltipAt
signature:
void ShowBubbleTooltipAt( 
   System.Int32
PointX
,
   System.Int32
PointY
,
   System.Int32
ArrowPos
,
   System.String
TitleString
,
   System.String
MessageString
,
   System.String
UrlLoc
)

parameters.name: PointX
parameters.description: x coordinate in pixels relative to upper-left corner of screen

parameters.name: PointY
parameters.description: y coordinate in pixels relative to upper-left corner of screen

parameters.name: ArrowPos
parameters.description: Arrow position as defined in swArrowPosition

parameters.name: UrlLoc
parameters.description: Any valid Windows Internet Explorer file (see Remarks )

remarks:
If you specified a ...
Then the ToolTip's bubble...
gif, .jpg, or .jpeg image for urlLoc
Is automatically expanded to accommodate the image
URL for urlLoc
Cannot be resized; if the URL is:
an HTML file, then the contents of the HTML file are displayed in the bubble ToolTip
to a website, then the default or specified web page at that website is displayed in the bubble ToolTip
